nodes.text: Pollard Seario was a male who served as the president of Czerka Corporation from roughly 4000 BBY to 3950 BBY. Notoriously corrupt, he led the company in committing a massive investment to the desert planet Tatooine, a venture that later became known as "Seario's Squander." Seario also established the company's headquarters on the planet Korriban, leading to the founding of the settlement Dreshdae. Centuries later, Seario was commemorated by the Seario Memorial Showroom on Czerka's research facility CZ-198.
